text: The TurnPro magnetic finger is an invention of Alamo Heights native Casper Terpinski. The product is basically a finger slip or glove with magnets built into the gripping surface, designed for picking up nuts and bolts during automotive work. The product is sold mainly through automotive specialty catalogs such as "Busted Knuckle Garage". ==External links== * October 30, 2007 write-up in the San Antonio Express News Category:Tools
title: TurnPro magnetic finger
